Text.Page:
A group of strange humanoids was spotted recently. Their involvement with matters here isn't certain, but they're definitely hostile.

We must learn their goals and masters. Defeat the {@LinkCreature:29#4011#Lokian battleragers}, {@LinkCreature:29#4012#Lokian warpriests}, {@LinkCreature:29#4021#Lokian deathreapers}, and {@LinkCreature:29#4022#Lokian warmages} and bring back any clues that may identify who they're working for.

This device is unfamiliar. The Lokians may have been working for themselves, but that seems unlikely. I shall dispatch reports and drawings to the Justicars and the Vanguards. Perhaps they've come across it in their shadowy world.

Your execution was flawless, . Well done.
There is certain to be some clue to their origin or employers. Lokians are frequently sold to the highest bidder. Someone paid well to use them against us. We should learn who.
